name: 1bitHeart
summary: Welcome to 1bitHeart―the latest title from Alicemare and LiEat developer △○□× (Miwashiba). In this unique and endearing adventure game, take on the role of Nanashi, a lonely, agoraphobic boy, as you solve a slew of mysteries around town while also making friends.

name: 1 Ball 1 Cup
summary: Try to get the ball into the cup.

name: 1-Bit Ninja
summary: A deliberate copy of the level design and graphical style of Super Mario Land for the Game Boy, with the added twist of being able to tilt the camera in 3D space to look for hidden pathways your ninja can take.

name: 1-Bit Rogue
summary: 1-Bit Rogue is a simple roguelike! It’s a monochrome game featuring super simple retro pixelart! Features a chiptune soundtrack for that nostalgic PSG sound chip feel!

name: 1-Bit Revival: The Residuals of Null
summary: Four arcade games that pit the player against swarms of enemies inside a deadly matrix system that is programmed to destroy you.

name: 1Bit Castle
summary: 1Bit Castle is a little tower defense game in which we are defending castle from the monsters.

name: 1BeatHeart
summary: Spinoff/sequel to 1BitHeart.

name: 1 Bit, 2 Bit, 3 Bit, Four.
summary: This game was made for the WOWIE game jam! in this game, you jump towards the top of the mountain! kinda over scoped with this game, thats why there isnt much content.

name: 1-Bit Samurai
summary: Slash your way through monsters in this black and white adventure.

name: 1 Bit Survivor
summary: 1 Bit Survivor is an easy to play but difficult to master randomly generated rogue-like with stylized pixel art and survival horror elements. Fight to survive 28 Days of the Zed-pocalypse and save your pet Cat!

name: 1-Bit Return
summary: 1-Bit Return is a Super Fun, Retro Isometric Platformer. Its Classic Style Features Retro PixelArt with Chiptune Sound Effects. Face 25 Arcade Challenges or Compete with the World in an Endless Adventure. Over 40 Randomised Worlds, 25 Challenges with Unlockable Characters and Much More.

name: 1B Spells
summary: 1000000000 Spells is an Arena Survival game where you fight off hordes of enemies by making your own spells on the go, using a complex and intricate programming-adjacent system. No more leveling up fireball from level 7 to level 8! Magic should be expressive, free, intense and chaotic.

name: 1 Bad Wad
summary: 10 short, quick Boom speedmaps + 1 credits map with a solid colors theme

name: 1-Bit Explorer
summary:
1-Bit Explorer is an adventure game focused on exploration where you do NOT save the world and the world does NOT need saving.

The point is to explore to your heart's content and uncover mysteries and secrets (or don't, it's up to you, really).

name: 1-Bit Halloween
summary: 1-Bit Halloween focuses on a home visit that a priest makes to a family. The game is on a single map with all the rooms of the house being visible to the player (like Dogville movie, in which you could see everything that happened in different places at once).

name: 1Bit Castle: Remake
summary: Dive into 1BIT CASTLE: REMAKE, a strategic action-packed tower defense game. Choose heroes and perks to fight off evil monsters. Enjoy captivating pixel art while protecting your treasures in this addictive adventure with endless mode!

name: 1-Button platformer
summary:
Space is the only button you need

There are 3 levels

If you cannot beat the levels holding shift in the level, select and dragging the red bar off of the levels will unlock them

(you might have to click on the game at the start)

name: 1-Bit Dungeon
summary: 1-Bit Dungeon is a fast-paced 2D action platformer that tests your swordsmanship in a brutal retro-inspired adventure. With crisp 1-bit pixel art and modern design, it offers intense combat, tight controls, and a rewarding challenge.

name: 1 Bit 1 Button
summary: A short sci-fi visual novel with minigames sprinkled within. The space bar is all you'll need.

name: 1 Bit Hero
summary: Get ready to explore lands far away and fight everything in your path. In a relentless twist of RPG/Survival Horde you’ll face many challenges, but all in due time, little hero.

name: 1Bit Space Shooter
summary: Embark on your space journey in a world of pure black and white pixels!1bit Space Shooter is a retro-style vertical shoot-em-up with minimalist 1-bit aesthetics, delivering fast-paced arcade action and nostalgic charm.
